law.text:
A boxer, kick boxer, wrestler, or mixed martial arts contestant who participates in a fake contest:
for the first offense, shall be prohibited for a period of 6 months beginning immediately after the offense from participating in a contest that is held by a person licensed to act as a promoter of a contest; and
for the second offense, shall be disqualified from attendance at or participation in a contest that is held by a person licensed to act as a promoter of a contest.
